name: Atelier GONS Style
description:
LORA trained on the art of Atelier GONS.

This style can help you achieve screencapish images. However, most ouptuts will have to be vertical, bc that's the majority of their work. Although, ControlNet and latent couple could be a fix to this, I am not sure.

184 images trained on NAI and tested across multiple models. Token requirement undetermined. NSFW capable.

Images you make with this model and what you do with them are your responsibility!
